text: Diospyros racemosa, is a semi-evergreen and also a dioecious tree in the ebony family with up to 20 m tall, distributed in India, and Sri Lanka.http://indiabiodiversity.org/species/show/263215 It is a well known ayurvedic plant used in Sri Lanka, where it is known as "kaha kala" or "kaluwella" by Sinhalese people.http://www.instituteofayurveda.org/plants/plants_detail.php?i=457&s;=Family_name ==References== *jstor.org ==External links== *uniprot *Preliminary Phytochemical Analysis of Diospyros Species racemosa Category:Flora of tropical Asia
title: Diospyros racemosa
